name: Path of Preservation
description:
A small 1 map multiplayer zombie survival game. 

This game has no real story but if you want some here it is... 

There was nuclear warfare and no real survivors, this caused those with the knowledge this would happen to dive deep underwater. The nukes that were set off had a virus in them that when spread caused all creatures, living or dead, to be turned into zombies. (I know how original...). They eventually find you in this giant ocean, and begin to attack your submarine. For all you know, you are the last remaining humans, so don't try to die... Have Fun!
